attributes.additional_details: These people are one of the most persecuted peoples on the planet this will eventually turn into a genocide, instead of focusing on oil its time for ACTUAL GOOD, Rohinya is in a misarable state and this will breed extremists, its in the interest of the nation to not allow this persecution to continue, First Diplomatic Means to stop the sectarian violence they do not respond intervene. This will benefit the countries image on the world stage immensely.
